afterInitialize(address,address).details: To be executed after Initializerequires not already initialized

burnFundingNFT(address,uint256,uint256).details: This function is used to burn NFT

params.account: The address to burn the funding nft from
params.amount: The amount of funding nft to be burn

burnReputationalToken(address,uint256).details: This function is used to burn reputational tokens.

params.amount: The amount of reputational tokens to be burnt.
params.from: The address to burn the reputational tokens from.

params.fundingNFT_: The ERC1155 token contract which will represent the lending amounts.
params.lendingToken_: The token that lenders will be able to lend.

lockFundingNFT(uint256,uint256,address).details: This function is used to send the ERC1155 tokens from lender to escrow.

params.amountOfNfts: The amount of ERC1155 tokens that should be locked.
params.sender: The address to lock the Nfts from..

mintReputationalToken(address,uint256).details: This function is used to mint reputational tokens.

params.amount: The amount of reputational tokens to be minted.
params.recipient: The address to mint the reputational tokens to.

multiMintReputationalToken(address[],uin.details: This function is used to multi mint reputational tokens.

params.amounts: The amounts of reputational tokens to be minted.
params.recipients: The addresses to mint the reputational tokens to.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

supportsInterface(bytes4).details: See {IERC165-supportsInterface}. Time complexity O(1), guaranteed to always use less than 30 000 gas.

transferFundingNFT(uint256,uint256,addre.details: This function is used to send the ERC1155 tokens from escrow to the lenders.

params.partitionsPurchased: The amount of ERC1155 tokens that should be sent back to the lender.

transferInvestmentToken(address,address,.details: This function is used to send the investment token amount to the seeker.

params.amount: The amount of investment tokens to be sent to seeker.
params.recipient: The address to transfer the investment tokens to.

transferLendingToken(address,address,uin.details: This function is used to send the lended amount to the seeker.

params.amount: The amount of lending tokens to be sent to seeker.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

userdoc.notice: Responsible for handling the funds in AllianceBlock's ecosystem.
